live_updates: Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
We await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56050.summary: Some customers in the Kerrisdale area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56050.title: Dec 11 - Vancouver (Kerrisdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technicians are working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Work to restore services in the area continues.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56037.summary: Some customers in the Maple Ridge area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56037.title: Dec 11 - Edmonton (Maple Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
